purpose: Convert all characters in a string to uppercase
titleCardParagraphs: Excel's UPPER function is used to change all letters in a given text to uppercase. This function can be particularly useful for normalizing data entries or ensuring data consistency before merging or grouping data.
This page explains how to use Excel's UPPER function in Python using pandas.

paragraphs: The UPPER function in Excel requires only one argument: the text you want to convert to uppercase.

syntaxTable.description: The text you want to convert to uppercase.

codeSections.title: Not Using .str Accessor
paragraphs: A frequent oversight is forgetting to use the `.str` accessor before applying string functions to a pandas Series.
If you mistakenly use `df['column'].upper()` instead of the correct `df['column'].str.upper()`, you'll encounter an AttributeError.
